name: Proof of Humanity
description: Proof of Humanity, a system combining webs of trust, with reverse Turing tests, and dispute resolution to create a sybil-proof list of humans.

tasks.name: Proof of Humanity
tasks.description: Register yourself and get vouched by an existing member of the PoH community at https://www.proofofhumanity.id/

tasks.name: Vouch
tasks.description: Vouch for people and score points for each registered vouchee.

tasks.name: Governance
tasks.description: Participate in PoH governance using Snapshot and score points for each vote

tasks.name: Delegated
tasks.description: Trust someone to participate in governance for you.

tasks.name: Delegate
tasks.description: Increase your voting power by becoming a trusted delegate.
